mdRecord.dcterms:description: In 1961, the entire building interior was gutted to house the museum and tomb of General Douglas MacArthur and his wife. The MacArthur Memorial also includes a visitor center building and a research center. -- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Norfolk_City_Hall [work]
